alert.note: Alert for Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:53PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN CHESTER AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 653 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Chester, or near Richburg, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Fort Lawn, Richburg, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Catawba, and Edgemoor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
